pageContext.seoDescription: Visit one of our Motorserve service centres across Sydney, NSW and Canberra today where you can expect the best care and attention every time.

image.alt: family unpacking from the back of a car

bannerMessage.title: Back on your way in no time

children.text: From logbook servicing to major repairs, our qualified mechanics at Motorserve go that extra mile to make sure your vehicle is as safe as possible for you and your loved ones. This includes a 100+ point safety and service check for every car service and work and parts guaranteed for 12 months or 20,000km°.

pageContext.title: Other Services

textField.cardGridText: Find out more about the wide range of other services and repairs Motorserve offers across our stores.

cards.title: Roadworthy inspections (NSW & ACT)
cards.description: We can provide NSW Pinkslips and ACT Roadworthy Inspections.

image.alt: motorserve mechanic in workshop next to silver car

cards.title: Vehicle inspections
cards.description: Buy a used car with confidence with a pre-sale inspection.

cards.title: Air conditioning and re-gas
cards.description: Motorserve can help keep you cool in summer and warm in winter.

cards.title: Brake services and repair
cards.description: We can inspect and repair your vehicle’s braking system.

cards.title: Clutch and transmission repair
cards.description: Is your vehicle's transmission or clutch playing up?

image.alt: mechanic handling car transmission for repair

cards.title: Radiator repairs and replacement
cards.description: Our qualified mechanics have years of experience in providing superior radiator service and repair.

image.alt: radiator cap in car for repair

cards.title: Child restraint installation
cards.description: We're committed to help keep you and your children safe on the road.

image.alt: motorserve mechanic installing child restraint in car

cards.title: Book car servicing
cards.description: We recommend servicing your car every 6 months. You can choose between a logbook or essential service.

cards.title: Protektiv Paint Protection
cards.description: Tougher than ever, new formula ceramic paint protection with graphene.

image.alt: Water beading on a car door

cards.title: Cleargard Paint Protection Film
cards.description: Virtually invisible protection film that protects your vehicles most vulnerable areas.

cards.title: Window Tinting
cards.description: Street Legal Window Tinting, the darkest legal automotive film

image.alt: Woman getting out of car with tinted windows

cards.title: Windscreen Repair and Replacement
cards.description: Get your windscreen replaced or repaired with Motorserve

cards.title: Antimicrobial Air Conditioning Treatment
cards.description: Protect your family’s health against infectious viruses and bacteria

cards.title: Motorserve M3 Dash Camera
cards.description: M4 Dash Camera - For increased confidence and safety while driving.

cards.title: Tyre Pressure Check
cards.description: Check your tyres for peace of mind.

cards.title: Wheel Alignment
cards.description: At Motorserve, we offer professional wheel alignment and wheel balancing services.

cards.title: Tyres
cards.description: Your tyres are the only thing between your car and the road!

cards.title: Motorserve M4 Dash Camera
cards.description: M4 Dash Camera - Record every drive with unbeatable quality.

cards.title: Headlight Restoration
cards.description: Visit one of our Motorserve stores across NSW, ACT and QLD today where you can expect the best care and attention every time.

cards.title: Car Detailing
cards.description: Car Detailing preserves the vehicle's value, enhances safety, prevents wear and tear, enhances the driving experience, identifies potential issues.

cards.title: Car Battery Replacement
cards.description: Car Battery Replacement ensures reliable vehicle starts and prevents breakdowns.
